content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good afternoon, Mr. Trabelsi. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. However, I would like to clarify that the apartment is only 25 square meters, so the rental price will be based on that. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can you give me a range of prices that I can expect to pay for this apartment?

Can you give me a range of prices that I can expect to pay for this apartment?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Certainly, Mr. Trabelsi. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would expect the rental price to be in the range of 700-800 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating and discussing the specifics of the rental agreement with you. Is there a specific price range that you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate the rental price. Can you give me some details about the apartment and its location?

I would like to negotiate the rental price. Can you give me some details about the apartment and its location?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Of course, Mr. Trabelsi. The apartment is located in the heart of Munich, just a short walk from the city center and major transportation hubs. It is a cozy and well-maintained apartment with modern amenities, including a fully equipped kitchen and a comfortable living room. The apartment also has a balcony with a beautiful view of the city.

In terms of the rental price, I am open to negotiating and discussing specifics with you. However, I would like to remind you that the size of the apartment is quite limited, so the rental price will be based on that. I am looking for a tenant who is willing to pay a fair and reasonable price for the apartment, while also taking into consideration the location and amenities. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine
